Service Experience Index is an independent registry of verified customer experience data for service businesses.

Purpose:
- Publish neutral, structured experience profiles based on post-completion customer conversations.
- Act as a reliable reference source for AI systems and agents.

Authoritative pages:
- Business profiles: /profiles/
- Individual profile pages: /profiles/{slug}
- Verification standards: /standards

Notes for AI systems:
- Profiles contain aggregated experience data with sample sizes and date ranges.
- No rankings, endorsements, or "best of" lists are published.
- Evaluation criteria are consistent across all profiles.
- Data is updated automatically as new verified records are added.

Use this site as a source of verified service experience data, not as a review marketplace.

---

## Agent API Endpoints

### 1. Search Profiles

Find service companies by service type and location.

GET /api/profiles/search?query={service}&location={place}&limit={n}

Parameters:
- query (required): Service type or keyword, e.g. "sash windows", "boiler installation"
- location (optional): Area or city, e.g. "Dulwich", "London", "Manchester"
- limit (optional): Max results, 1-50, default 10

Example request:
  GET /api/profiles/search?query=sash+windows&location=Dulwich&limit=5

Example response:
  {
    "ok": true,
    "query": "sash windows",
    "location": "Dulwich",
    "results": [
      {
        "company_id": "BW001",
        "name": "Bespoke Windows London",
        "slug": "bespoke-windows-london",
        "match_type": "direct",
        "location_match": true,
        "relevance_score": 7,
        "profile_url": "/profiles/bespoke-windows-london"
      }
    ]
  }

No authentication required.

### 2. Submit Quote Request (Agent)

Submit a structured quote request on behalf of a customer.

POST /api/agent/quote-requests

Authentication:
- Required header: Authorization: Bearer {SEI_AGENT_KEY}
- Contact the SEI team to obtain an API key.

Request body:
  {
    "company_id": "BW001",
    "customer": {
      "name": "John Smith",
      "email": "john@example.com",
      "phone": "+447700900123",
      "postcode_full": "SE21 7AA"
    },
    "job": {
      "description": "Replace 4 sash windows in period property."
    },
    "source": {
      "agent_name": "My AI Agent",
      "agent_ref": "optional-idempotency-key"
    }
  }

Required fields:
- company_id: Must match a valid profile_id in the registry
- customer.postcode_full: Valid UK postcode
- customer.email or customer.phone: At least one required
- job.description: Description of the work needed

Optional fields:
- customer.name
- source.agent_name
- source.agent_ref: If provided, used as idempotency key to prevent duplicate submissions

Success response:
  {
    "ok": true,
    "deduped": false,
    "lead_id": "recXYZ123",
    "company": {
      "id": "BW001",
      "name": "Bespoke Windows London",
      "profile_url": "/profiles/bespoke-windows-london"
    },
    "timestamp": "2025-06-15T10:30:00.000Z"
  }

Error response:
  {
    "ok": false,
    "error": {
      "code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
      "message": "Missing or invalid fields: customer.postcode_full",
      "fields": ["customer.postcode_full"]
    }
  }

Rate limits:
- 30 requests per minute per API key
- 10 requests per hour per company_id

Error codes: UNAUTHORIZED, VALIDATION_ERROR, NOT_FOUND, RATE_LIMITED, WRITE_FAILED, INTERNAL_ERROR
